Reviews.Title: “Good location for travellers”
Reviews.Author: Glow_wormnz
Reviews.Content: miss university wife used ibis amsterdam airport hotel one night madrid picked hotels shuttle outside along weary travelers 100 hotel quite large hallways spread different directions check quite chaotic seemingly worked staff attempted accommodate many customers elevator rather small looks like something meat hallway walls white tons marks holes decoration looked like large university entering room taken back heat attempted work airconditioning system appeared order called front desk informed hotel airconditioning air system work temperature high seemed room okay size fake modern furnishings seen better days carpet stains cigarette bit hungry searched hotels coffee shop quite none hotel working perhaps caused high temperatures coffee shop filled young group tour seems hotel caters group tours young singles around europe perhaps theme however wife one night uncomfortable sleep well warmth room bed help create evening luckily simply living suitcases one night room bathroom much storage bathroom would expect cheapest motel euros ibis amsterdam airport hotel worth stay different establishment next time layover

Reviews.Title: “Close to airport”
Reviews.Author: wereldburgerAlkmaar
Reviews.Content: put hotel airline take later flight back us although room clean beds hard could barely sleep tv tiny 16 far across room making nearly impossible enjoy last world cup game agreed stay another day love amsterdam stayed hotel first time experience would far expectations

Reviews.Title: “Liked my stay here”
Reviews.Author: JamesRamyaRajan
Reviews.Content: satisfactory stay spotlessly clean room nicely decorated light colours breakfast buffet adequate plus points good rolls fresh fruit salad good yogurt french italian restaurants inside hotel well american bar open late tried last one good food friendly service shuttle bus service among best schiphol airport hotels last bus hotels leaves airport really awkward want spend evening amsterdam since actually take train city good time 11 pm ibis bus keeps going starts couple hours later morning one drawback though hotel doesnt offer luggage storage youre checking leaving amsterdam later day either check bags central station amsterdam early checkin schiphol airport without going security definitely stay hotel though would prefer stay centrally amsterdam rooms available reasonable rate normal city

Reviews.Content: excellent budget airport hotel exterior ibis schiphol airport hotel

Reviews.Title: “standart hotel out of the city”
Reviews.Author: msaylan
Reviews.Content: good choice stayed ibis hotel 4 nights beginning may hotel large rooms several cafes restaurants one price medium range room well equipped large enough two persons hall find cafe relaxing area internet points 30 shop pub red free shuttle bus airport airport takes mins airport takes longer 20 mins stops hotel novotel shuttle service starts 430 ends 130 usually service 20 mins usually time aware ready mins early bus full drivers start little earlier staff usually friendly problem waiting time checkin guests arrive shuttle bus means moment least 20 persons want checkin 3 reach center amsterdam train airport choice bus connection tram 1 outside hotel bus stop called ibis hotel line goes airport station amsterdam stop transfer tram line 1 goes central station passing leidsplein dam total time option 40 mins buy one day pass bus 3 days pass tourist information hotel good choice price competitive

Reviews.Title: “Free shuttle to and from the airport - a big Bonus, clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Neha11111
Reviews.Content: good airport hotel large hotel wide range catering outlets rooms well equipped shuttle bus runs every twenty minutes found taking ten minutes airport twenty minutes return gripe always enough check open extra clerk would welcome busy times need inexpensive airport hotel would recommend one

Reviews.Title: “KLM Delay- Free Night”
Reviews.Author: misodiva
Reviews.Content: pleasant surprise stuck ibis due cancelled flight didnt expect much knowing ibis chain budget travelers however pleasantly surprised upon arrival friendly quick 3 restaurants buffet choose well fully equipped bar tired took bath huge bathtub ordered hour full body massage pretty crazy budget hotel massage great done room didnt even go anywhere food dinner well breakfast tasty also available internet free airport shuttle happy stay ibis ever overnight layover ill sure return

Reviews.Title: “Average. Unremarkable. But acceptable.”
Reviews.Author: MajorVoid
Reviews.Content: price great hotel long flight usa expected sit lobby check time 3 pm greeted lovely lady checked us 9 rooms small thought near airport might noisy bed little hard im used sleeping bed breakfast great good selection shuttle airport nearly full came every 20 minutes fast trip train amsterdam city center id sure stay paid usd steal amsterdam flew free dinner looked good planning shopping amsterdam place far town place stay get nights days straight great

Reviews.Content: overpriced 4 star hotel room service completely closes 11pm note airport hotel unfortunately need something eat even ten minutes prior time service room service may possible either staff currently standard leaving hold ten minutes longer

Reviews.Content: live 70 airport early flight catch thats decided book room night airport 10 minute drive close highway boring surroundings efficient rooms ok clean nothing special go catch flight

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: AseyeCit
Reviews.Content: stayed 2011 hotel good 15 minutes driving distance shuttle service provided helpful hotel offers pickup drop airport every 30 mins rooms clean double bed tv table chair wouldnt call room spacious enough business traveler overnight air travel layover food good breakfast buffet included stay lunch dinner la carte menu good well bar well stocked negative would travelling pleasure tourist coming back late night reaching central locations hotel would require cab
